08 August 2018

Fake news and stance detection

For the term project of our natural language processing (NLP) class, I collaborated with two other NYU graduate students, Antonio Mallia and Kedar Gangopadhyay. We decided to revisit the Fake News Challenge (FNC-1) and experiment with different linguistic features to solve the task of stance (and ultimately, fake news) detection.

You can read all about our work in our paper called “Debunking Fake News One Feature at a Time”.

View project on GitHub ☺︎

Til next time,
Melanie
